section.name: General Settings
section.description: This contains general format settings for UsfmTex macro package.

setting.name: Measurement Unit
setting.description: The unit of measurement used in this publication.

setting.name: Source Encoding Transform
setting.description: In the case of multi-script projects or non-Unicode, an encoding transformation may be needed make the source data useful to the system. The encoding information is stored in the Encoding section and should be the same as other files used in this project. (Default = False)

root.section:
Page Layout PageLayout Page layout information. This covers general page layout format options.
Page Size ID Code If you are using a common page size please enter the standard code. If a custom size is being used just enter "custom". Default = A5 pageSizeCode string A5
Starting Page Number Sometimes the content should not start with the default page number of '1'. If a number is set in this field, the macro will insert a \pageno command in the control file. Note this is for the main content section only. Individual components in the front and back matter must have the \pageno command inserted manually into their control files. Default = Null (which means no command output, page starts on '1') pageNumberBegin integer
Page Height This is the height of the page after it has been printed and trimmed to its final size. Default = 210mm (A5) pageHeight integer 210
Page Width This is the width of the page after it has been printed and trimmed to its final size. Default = 148mm (A5) pageWidth integer 148
Base Margin Unit Basic unit for margins changing this will alter them all. Default = 12mm marginUnit integer 10
Top Margin The distance from the top of the page to the printable text area. Default = 10 topMargin integer 10
Bottom Margin The distance from the bottom of the page to the printable text area. Default = 10 bottomMargin integer 10
Inside Margin The distance from the inside of the page (gutter) to the printable text area. Default = 10 insideMargin integer 10
Outside Margin The distance from the outside of the page (left or right) to the printable text area. Default = 10 outsideMargin integer 10
Gutter Space Add extra space from the inside of the printable text area. Leave it at 0 (zero) if no extra space is needed. Default = 0 gutterSpace integer 0
Body Columns The The number of columns used for body text. Default = 2 bodyColumns integer 2
Introduction Columns The The number of columns used for introduction text. Default = 1 introColumns integer 1
s Use Footnote Rule Set to true to be able to use a footnote rule that goes between the body text and footnotes. useFootnoteRule boolean True
Use Binding Gutter Set to true if a binding gutter is to be used on this publication. useBindingGutter boolean False

section.name: Text Elements
section.description: General settings for text level elements

setting.name: Justify Paragraphs
setting.description: Paragraphs are justified by default. Set this to false to turn off justification. Default = True

setting.name: Right To Left
setting.description: Uncomment to use right-to-left text layout mode Default = False
